content: Bhan... don't you think that fishing rod you're holding would be perfect for catching some small fish?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
So, I came up with a brilliant solution—{短暂停}
Let's add fish balloons to the fish pond!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: I understand! I shall catch one for you right away!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Yeep~ Let me catch it for you!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Next time for sure!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Yeep! I've been found out!
...Very well, I shall grab a fishing rod and
throw caution to the wind!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
...Oh, never mind,
I'll look for it myself.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I don't fancy fish—there's too little meat.
Though I've heard of a certain seasoning
that can make any ingredient deliciously spicy!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I'm still working on improving the fishing game,
A simple score competition,
Doesn't seem quite lively enough~!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Curses, where could this worthy "opponent"
be hiding?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Leave it to me! I'll catch one for you!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
As expected of you, you understood my subtle hint,
And as expected of me, bhan!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
There have always been exactly five fish,
and the tank hasn't leaked, nor shown any other anomalies...
How mysterious~
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I came back today,
and even though I've been practicing the "Immovable as Mountain" stance for quite some time now,
I still haven't encountered a worthy opponent to test my skills against!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Yeep~ If one desires fish, one must catch it oneself!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Regarding fishing,
I'm trying my best.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I really wanted to properly observe and study these color changes,
When you have an idea, you should act on it right away, right?
And then{短暂停}I've been sitting here with an empty fishing rod ever since.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Yip! I must spit this out!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: You should try fishing more often.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
That's how I've always encouraged myself.
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, thank you for your encouragement.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Now, my plan is halfway complete!
If only someone could help me catch fish...
The fishing game shall commence very soon!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I've recently discovered that not everything
can be used as fish bait.
For instance, my Dough.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I thought shiny things would catch their attention,
but even though it's not food,
they won't spit it out.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: You should practice the "Immovable as Mountain" stance a bit more~
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Thank you!
My friends skilled in fishing,
Are shining brilliantly before my eyes.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I see, I see...
So this must be what they mean by
"unwavering persistence" in the prologues of martial arts manuals!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Yeep~ I'm sorry, but could you please
help me catch another fish?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Yesterday, while practicing the "Immovable as a Mountain" technique,
I could have sworn I saw a fish that looked like a "master,"
and I actually thought about challenging it to a duel.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
The delicate scales cascade down following the body's contours,
yet they create such wonderfully natural rainbow-like hues,
it's absolutely fascinating~ How adorable!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Yeep~ Isn't everyone finding fish through their bubbles?
What if there were fish balloons that could deflate?
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
You must bring me any <color=#8AAB4B>freshwater fish</color> you've caught recently,
absolutely essential.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Knowing when to let go is important too,
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, just one is enough.
Thank you, sweetie~.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Let me help you find it.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Then allow me to help you with the fishing!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Very well, I'll leave it to you.
I shall inquire with the other Neighbors.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: I shall proceed with "unwavering persistence"!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Yeep! 
It seems you've been hiding quite the talent.
I'll be counting on you then!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Yeep~ You caught me out,
I must admit my fishing skills are rather lacking.
Very well then, I shall redouble my efforts.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Hmm, how troubling... this is most unadorable...
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Sometimes when we don't achieve the results we desire,
it's because we haven't persisted long enough,
or perhaps... we persisted for far too long.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
The path of swimming fish,
Sometimes resembles the mysterious flows in the celestial river,
I could watch them forever without growing weary.
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: I'm preoccupied at the moment~
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
How touching! I hereby declare you the game's
finest patron! The "<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>" Cup!
When we launch, I must display such a banner!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
I see, indeed!
A brave knight will always find a stage to showcase their prowess!
I shall strive towards my goals with my own strength!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content:
Especially the ones in my fish tank,
but... when I counted them last night,
I found one was missing!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_
幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_

content: Yee~ Never give up! Perseverance is the key to victory!
info: 幻雪友邻任务-发布鱼任务_
